Title: Loyalty
Writer: Courtney Kemp Agboh (created by), Raphael Jackson Jr., Damione Macedon, Vladimir Cvetko (staff writer)
Actors: Omari Hardwick, Lela Loren, Naturi Naughton, Joseph Sikora
Plot: Tasha finally sees Angela; Ghost learns a friend may be responsible for the hits; Angela attempts to stop an upcoming attack; Ghost makes a promise to Angela.
